archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.3.10a: a) secure communication protocols or techniques (e.g. transport layer security (TLS) or a service mesh) when communicating with other devices (e.g. other containers or API servers)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
